fields.description: The number of maximum concurrent requests per node allowed per deployment. Defaults to 1.
fields.name: MaxConcurrentRequestsPerInstance

fields.description:
(Deprecated for Managed Online Endpoints) The maximum amount of time a request will stay in the queue in ISO 8601 format.
Defaults to 500ms.
(Now increase `request_timeout_ms` to account for any networking/queue delays)
fields.name: MaxQueueWait

fields.description:
The scoring timeout in ISO 8601 format.
Defaults to 5000ms.
fields.name: RequestTimeout
